section.title: System Bar
section.p: The System Bar contains the following menu options:
The Tenant Switcher allows you to switch tenants. See Switch Tenant tutorial.

section.title: Primary Navigation Menu
section.p: The Primary Navigation Menu can be accessed from all screens to navigated through the application and to the home page.
This menu can also be used to launch other Service Orchestration related applications.
It is accessed by selecting the dark icon on the left of all screens as shown above, to open the menu shown below.
The Primary Navigation Menu contains the following menu options:

ul.li: SO - returns you to the SO homepage dashboard from any screen
Service Orchestration - shows links to specific orchestration screens
Universal Design Studio - can be used to launch UDS in a new browser tab
System - can be used to launch system applications in new browser tabs
